utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh hey Ross, oh I'm so glad someone's here. Could you zip me up?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Sure.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Thank you. Can you believe no one between my apartment and here offered to do that for me?.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: People. So why you all dressed up?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh umm. Mike's picking me up for a date.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh yea? Now um, how is that going, is it getting serious?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh I dunno, I dunno, you know I mean, I like him but am I ready to take my grade-A loins off the meat market?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You know, I really admire your whole dating attitude, it's so healthy. I'm always like, is this moving to fast? Is this moving to slow? Where's this going?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, you know, you are a bit of a drama queen.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: But you, you're so much better off. You just go from guy to guy having fun and never worrying that it terms into anything serious.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I wouldn't say never, you know. There's that guy ... well what about...OK well there's gotta be someone.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: There isn't. That's what I'm saying.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God, you're right!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I know, and yet here you are, all ready for the next date.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I can't believe I never realized this before. I'm in my 30s and never been in a long-term relationship! Oh my God! What's wrong with me?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No, no, no there's nothing wrong with you. I mean, you don't strike me as the type of person that wants to get married anyway.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I wanna get married!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Please don't cry because of me, Pheebs. I don't know what I'm talking about. I've been divorced three times!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: At least you've been married! Oh my God! I wanna trade lives with Ross!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Phoebe, what's wrong?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Nothing, I'm excited about our date. Mike, this is Ross Geller. Ross, this is Mike Haaaaa...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm sorry I didn't catch...

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: It's Mike Hanagen.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, Ross Geller.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Hey, so are you sure you're ready to go?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh huh. How do I look?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Do you have a compact in your purse?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You look great.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, this girl won't turn around and I can't tell whether she's hot or not, what do you think?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey, I am not going to objectify woman with you! But if her face is as nice as her ass, woah mamma!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All rright thanks. Oh hey, have you talked to Chandler?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah, he has to stay in Tulsa this weekend.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How come?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: He has to work, there's some rush on the big ... ah damn it, one of these days I'm really gonna have to start listening when he talks about his job.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh. Why don't you fly out there and surprise him?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Maybe I will go....Yeah, we'll have a second honeymoon at the Tulsa Romana.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh and you know what you should bring? The black see-through teddy with the attached garters.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: How do you know I have one of those?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Didn't till just now.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hot not hot. Hot!

utterance.speaker: Hayley
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I said I think you're hot and now I'm embarrassed.

utterance.speaker: Hayley
utterance.content: Oh I thought you said "Hi."

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That would've been better, I'll try that. Hi, I'm Joey.

utterance.speaker: Hayley
utterance.content: I'm Hayley.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look, I don't usually ask out women that I meet in coffeehouses...

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Ha!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Gesundheit!

utterance.speaker: Hayley
utterance.content: I would love to go out with you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Really, great, did I actually ask you?

utterance.speaker: Hayley
utterance.content: No, that's just where you were going. I just figured that I'd help you out, you don't seem like the kind of guy that does this a lot.

utterance.speaker: Gunther
utterance.content: Ha!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Seriously Gunther, you should see someone about that cold. If it gets much worse you could DIE!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So how'd the date go?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, it was awful! Every time I thought about what you said, I started crying.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So he hasn't called?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Would you call this girl? Thanks-fo-r-a-love-ly-even-ing.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Now I feel terrible, this is all my fault.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, you know what you should feel terrible about? This could have been my serious guy! He was sweet and smart and funny. Do you know how hard it is to meet a guy like that?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: We are a rare breed.

utterance.speaker: Hayley
utterance.content: What a great dinner.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah! And hey, thanks again for letting me have that last piece of cake at the restaurant.

utterance.speaker: Hayley
utterance.content: You're welcome again. I'm gonna make some coffee. Can I get you anything?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Do you have any cake?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: So this is going pretty good. Dinner was nice, got a lot in common. Victoria's secret, huh, we even like the same books. Oh now there's a scary painting. Wait a minute! I think I've been scared by that painting before. You know what, this whole place look familiar! I have definitely been in this apartment! I know I've seen this weird plant before ouch! It did that the last time! Oh my God, I've gone out with this girl before! Yeah, we had sex on this couch and then on that chair and...no, we didn't do it here, which is weird because it seems like a perfectly good place. ouch! That's why.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey Mike sorry to just drop by like this, can I come in?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Sure. Who are you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'm Ross, Phoebe's friend from the coffeehouse.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, I really, really need to talk to you about something.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: OK, unless... you're not gonna try to get me to join a cult are you?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: No

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Oh, it's just you have that look

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Damn super cuts!

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: What's up? Is Phoebe OK?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh no, yeah, no, Phoebe is great, but umm... I'm an idiot. Look, right before you guys went out, I accidentally got her all upset.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: That's why she was weird.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, yeah, I said something stupid about her never having had a serious relationship, but you should know she is so much fun, a wonderful person! Please don't blow her off.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: I'm not blowing her off. I actually just got off the phone with her. We're going out tomorrow night. I mean, I hope that's OK with you, stranger from the coffee house.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well then, I didn't need to bother you or the four other Mike Hanagens I bothered.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Hey wait wait wait wait! Is that true what you said? Phoebe's never had a serious relationship?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Of course she has. If she'd never had a serious relationship, I'd go around broadcasting it like some unstoppable moron.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: But you did say it.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, yes I did. And I will also say what I'm about to say vis-a-vis the following, Phoebe has never had a serious relationship since her...super-serious relationship with...Vicrum.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Vicrum?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What, that's a real name!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oklahoma, where the wind comes sweeping down the plain...STOP IT! Why couldn't they have sent me to Texas? 7 o'clock, maybe I'll hit the gym. Who am I kidding? Pay-per-view porn!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Do not disturb! Do not disturb! Monica!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Is everything all right?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Everything's great, just watching some regular television there, what a pleasant surprise.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm gonna go freshen up, OK?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: OK honey.... That was close.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hello.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hey Rach, its me, OK, I just got to Chandler's room and I caught him molesting himself.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Oh, that couldn't have been pretty. But you know, guys do that.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yeah well, the weird part is... he was getting off to a shark attack show!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Noooooo!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes! Chandler watches shark porn!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Well, watching sharks? Are you sure that's what he was doing?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Do you know how many times I've seen him jump up like that? Believe me, I know what he was doing.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Man, sharks. I always knew there was something weird about that dude. But you promised to love him no matter what.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Which means if he gets like a disease or kills someone. Not if he gets his jollies to Jaws!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ah! You know what honey? Guys are just different. They like things that we can't understand. You know, I once dated this guy who wanted to pretend he was an archeologist and I was a naughty cave woman that he unfroze from a block of ice.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Eww, are you talking about my bother?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, I didn't disguise that very well, did I.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Hi.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Listen to this... I went out with this girl last night and half way through our date, I realized I already slept with her!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So basically, you've slept with all the woman in New York and now you're just going around again.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well that's not even the weird part. I don't think she remembered sleeping with me.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: But you don't remember sleeping with her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, but she should remember sleeping with me! I am very memorable, you guys know.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What, how do we know, we never slept with you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And who's fault is that?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What's the big deal, you forgot, she forgot, maybe you were having an off night.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey! I never have an off night, OK, although sometimes when I'm a little bloated I don't feel very sexy, but even then I'm better than most!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey, why don't you just let it go and ask her out again?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah, you're both so slutty you don't even remember who you've slept with! You're made for each other.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Interesting. All right, I'll go out with her again and try to get past it Oh salt, bloaty!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Joey, Joey.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You don't think sharks are sexy do you?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No. Wait a minute, what was the little mermaid?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's open.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Hey! Mike called, we're going out again! Yay yay!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yay! Quick thing, I went to talk to Mike.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What? Wha-wha-what did you do, Ross!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh boy, you got mad at that part. I went over there to tell him how great you are but you know me, blah blah blah, and I ended up telling him ...that....

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Umm... that you had a six-year-long relationship with a guy named Vicrum.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: What? Why!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well, he seemed too bummed out that you'd never been in a serious relationship.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: If you hadn't just had a baby with my best friend I swear to Lucifer a rabid dog would be feasting on your danglers right now!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Well Phoebe, I think you'll feel better when you know a little bit about Vicrum. He's a kite designer! And he used to date Oprah!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I'm not going along with some lie you made, Ross. No I'm just gonna be honest with him.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Good, yeah, just be honest with him.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah, I've nothing to be ashamed of. OK, so I haven't been in a relationship that lasted longer then a month. OK, I haven't had a real boyfriend. You know, if he can't handle that, he can leave. Which he will, and that's OK. So I'll just be alone forever, you know, alright, I'll be... it'll be fine, it'll be fine. I'll go on walking tours with widows and lesbians.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I'll get it.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: OK.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: You know, I'm trying to think of the last time I opened a door and you weren't there. Phoebe, are you OK?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Uh huh yeah. There's just something umm, there's something you should know.... Vicrum just called.

utterance.speaker: Hayley
utterance.content: So it was kind of a shock. After 25 years of marriage, my parents, a perfect couple, getting divorced. I kinda took it the hardest 'cause I was the youngest.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Uh huh, sure, yeah. How can you not remember me?

utterance.speaker: Hayley
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How could you not remember that we slept together?

utterance.speaker: Hayley
utterance.content: What! When?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I dunno!

utterance.speaker: Hayley
utterance.content: I really, really think I would remember sleeping with you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on, come on, search your brain. All right. it was ... a certain amount of time ago, I was here, you were here, we had sex here, here, here NOT there. Anything?

utterance.speaker: Hayley
utterance.content: No, it's not ringing any bells.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: My God, woman! How many people do you have to have been with not to remember any of this?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oooooh, I slept with you! And you obviously remember me. Hey! I still got it. So we're good. I'll let myself out.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: ...and I said Vicrum, you can't just call every time you get lonely, you know, you, you gave up that right when you slept with Rachel.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: But Rachel I thought she just had a baby with Ross.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah well yeah you know, Emma's birth certificate might say Geller but her eyes say Mookurgee.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: That is so wrong and on top of that he's a glue sniffer.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know but he calls and my heart goes to him. You know that bastard is one smooth-talking free-lance kite designer.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: I just think there's somebody better out there for you, I mean I'm not saying me but...maybe me.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: And you don't have to worry about glue sniffing with me. Although I do smell the occasional magic marker, yeah ah anyway, I just think I can make you happy.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: OK I can't do this.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: What's wrong?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well there is no Vicrum, Ross made him up because I never really have been in a long-term relationship, I've never lived with a guy, and I've never even celebrated an anniversary so...if that's too weird for you and you wanna leave I totally understand. In fact I'll close my eyes, make it less awkward You kissed me.

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Uh huh.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: So you don't think I'm a total freak

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: No. Well look, can I think you're weird and also cool for telling me the truth and also wanna kiss you?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I guess so, can I, can I think it's cool that you kiss me and also wanna kiss you again and umm, be a little concerned about the magic markers?

utterance.speaker: Mike
utterance.content: Definitely

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: This is Vicrum.

utterance.content: Hi honey I'm home!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Hi, how was your flight?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh it was great.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Here why don't you sit down, get yourself comfortable because I have a little surprise for you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, well, well it must be five in Tulsa because it's six o clock in NYC!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: OK. This is how much I love you.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Honey, why am I watching a bunch of sharks swimming around?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Is this not the good part? Do you want me to fast forward to something a little toothier?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No, I'm not quite sure you got the right movie, that's all.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh well, this is the only one they had at our video store, but they did have something called crocodile killers. Or does it always have to be sharks?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Does what always have to be sharks?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Honey, look, we can do something else, do you want me to get into the tub and thrash?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What's going on?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Sweetie it's OK, I still love you, let me be a part of this.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Let ME be a part of this!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I saw what you were doing in Tulsa. Angry sharks turn you on!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No they don't

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Then why were you watching them and giving yourself a treat?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God! When you came in, I switched the channel, I was just watching regular porn!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Really?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, just some good old-fashioned girl-on-girl American action.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I cannot tell you how happy that makes me!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You are an amazing wife. No really, you're amazing! You were actually gonna do this for me, I mean, where do you find the strength and understanding over something like that?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm very, very drunk right now.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: See, ordinarily I would talk to her, but my confidence is shaken... did I sleep with her? did I not sleep with her?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You know, maybe this is a wake-up call, about your whole dating attitude. You're in your 30's and you've never had a serious relationship and you have never been in a long-term relationship, here you go from woman to woman, meaningless experience to meaningless experience, never even worrying that it doesn't turn into anything serious.

utterance.content: You're right! I love my life! I actually did sleep with her.
